overview:
Advanced Technical Services designs, develops and implements third party logistics solutions for our clients that enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of their supply chain.

ATS has designed supply chain solutions for clients across a wide variety of Industries. We offer a complete menu of reverse logistics and depot repair services that will add value and reduce costs in your operation.

Advanced Technical Services has provided Reverse Logistics and Assembly solutions to customers worldwide since 1981. Our clients trust us to help manage their supply chain and provide them with high-quality and lower cost programs, services and solutions. Through an ongoing commitment to Total Customer Satisfaction we offer customized solutions that insure your needs are met and your operations are improved.
